properties.title: House of the Knights of St. John
properties.abstract: The Knights' House at Bubikon is regarded as the best preserved commandery of the Order of St. John. Its history goes back to 1192. It is now maintained by the Knights' House Society and features an interesting museum and historic rooms.
properties.description: The Knights’ House at Bubikon is regarded as the best preserved commandery of the Order of St. John. Its history goes back to 1192. Nowadays it is maintained by the Knights’ House Society and features an interesting museum and historic rooms, which can be hired for events and celebrations. The overall layout of the Knights’ House at Bubikon is that of a virtually closed building complex around a picturesque courtyard. The House offers guided tours for groups, apéros, complete catering facilities, and a party service.
properties.name: Rapperswil Zürichsee Tourismus
